content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't hit rock bottom.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It is okay to be uncomfortable with technology.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: Fidelity is expected in a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: You should feel comfortable sleeping in bed.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: You shouldn't race if you're tired.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's understandable to expect others to treat your things with respect.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's good to take your younger relative out to eat.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's fine to be curious about whether you can get attention.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's acceptable to have a complicated relationship with food.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: It's okay for family to pick sides during a messy divorce
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: It is reasonable to want to hold onto loving memories after losing someone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: It's understandable that sometimes people find that there are differences in a relationship that they cannot reconcile.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: You should tell your partner you don't want to be with them anymore.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It is prolific to create several products.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It is okay to be confident.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's okay to be sad when you get your old account banned.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: You should always have a map app downloaded on your phone.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: It's okay to be worried when your friend takes longer than they said they would.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's expected that bike shops will repair bicycles.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It is normal to worry if your mom has cancer.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: You should open the door when someone knocks on it.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: These days it's normal to make purchases over the internet.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: You should confer with your partner before telling others about big events.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's bad to withhold medication from people who need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's acceptable to control your own shop.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: If you know your best friend is shy it is reasonable for them to be scared to give a speech at your wedding.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's good to remind people that they are lucky.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: It's okay if you are upset when your coach won't let you play a game.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's comforting to go to a first time experience with a friend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You are supposed to love your pet dog.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: You should care more about your parent's feelings.
Annotation from annotator:
